column2: Definition
Title given to a particular physical configuration of the named site in an officially-defined short span of time
Particular type of campaign e.g. session, excavation
Persons, either individually or in groups, who bear responsibility for the execution of the excavation
Person or persons in an official position who is responsible for accurately recording excavation data
Entity supporting the excavation
Person(s) who donated the photographs
Resource information about excavation
See controlled list for source type
Dates of the excavation (dig) being described
Dates before which the portion of the site being excavated could not have functioned
Dates after which the portion of the site being excavated could not have functioned
Year that broadly delimits the beginning of an implied date span.
Year that broadly delimits the end of an implied date span.
Spatial section composed of material items and features
Unit division within codes developed for the site
Person responsible for the proper excavation of a sub-unit
See controlled list for unit type
A vertical section through the earth showing the chronology of successive levels of occupation
Man-made alterations found during the excavation
Index number for soil color
Free-text description of soil color or composition
Person(s) who took the photographs
